name: Voo Services Ltd.
description: Provider of e-commerce middleman shipping services intended to connect business owners with the best match of couriers. The company manages and follows the last-mile delivery with courier companies and offers different payment options, a dashboard to extract data and numbers to analyze and compare profits and revenue on a given date, pickups, and insurance options for the products, enabling small and medium enterprises to cut costs, find preferred couriers and increase the delivery success rate.
one_liner: Provider of e-commerce middleman shipping services intended to connect business owners with the best match of couriers. The company manages and follows the last-mile delivery with courier companies and offers different payment options, a dashboard to extract data and numbers to analyze and compare profits and revenue on a given date, pickups, and insurance options for the products, enabling small and medium enterprises to cut costs, find preferred couriers and increase the delivery success rate.
